wo-053-reactivation.instruction: Reactivate and verify Phase 23 as per Architect Prime's instructions. 1) Update scripts/verify_phase23.py to be compatible with DTO-based agents (from WO-135). 2) Enforce metrics: Supply/Demand Ratio >= 2.5, Price Crash > 50% within 20 ticks, Pop Boom limit 2,000. 3) Set TECH_FERTILIZER_MULTIPLIER to 3.0 and Price Volatility Limit to 0.5. 4) Run the simulation and generate a success/fail report based on these metrics. Reference: Handover 2026-01-28.
wo-053-reactivation.title: WO-053: Phase 23 Reactivation (The Great Expansion)
